jobs.title: Retail Promoter
jobs.description:
Are you looking for flexible, part time hours with great hourly pay and generous bonus opportunities?

Do you love talking with new people...

Mr. Rogers Windows is looking for retail promoters to work in Elizabeth City, NC

As a Retail Promoter, you will bring brand awareness to prospective customers and turn that awareness into quality leads.

We are looking for dynamic and motivated promoters who will strive to meet customer objectives for our brand.

You will be responsible for marketing activities in local stores.

Qualifications:

Customer oriented approach
Passionate about promoting our company
Outgoing and friendly personality
Professional appearance
Attention to detail
High level of integrity
Ability to stand for extended periods of time (4+ hours)
Reliable transportation to the workplace
Ability to work 4 to 5 days a week, weekends included.
Responsibilities:

Set up and maintain a demonstration area, such as a table, stand or booth at various locations.
Keep the area tidy and well stocked with literature.
Engage every customer that you encounter during your work shift.
Answer questions potential customers might have about our company and services.
Benefits:

Excellent company culture!
Earn $15.00/hr with uncapped bonuses - earn double or triple that with bonuses.
Paid training
Flexible schedule
Options to go full time (after 90 days)
If this sounds like you, apply now and join a great team!

See you around the neighborhood!

Company DescriptionMr. Rogers Windows is your friendly neighborhood window and door company. Our unique culture allows each member to shine. Come join a team dedicated to serving our customers while feeling appreciated for your contributions. Our compensation reflects our belief in our employees. Enjoy high wages, bonuses, profit sharing and benefits

jobs.title: Brand Promoter
jobs.description:
Job Overview:

Are you looking for a part-time opportunity to make additional income? Are you outgoing, love speaking to people, and want to be a part of a growing company? Look no further... this is a great opportunity for you! We offer a competitive wage with an hourly pay and performance bonuses...

The Brand Ambassador represents Marvin Replacement at retail locations, trade shows, and events in order to generate & set sales appointments. Highlights of your role:
• Representing Marvin Replacement at local retail locations, shows, and events in a professional, enthusiastic manner
• Promote and demonstrate the Marvin Replacement experience
• Generate and schedule quality sales appointments through positive, informative customer interactions
• Assist with transportation, setup, execution, and breakdown of event displays
• Interacting with potential customers daily and selling them on the Marvin brand Salary Range: Potential to earn $25-$30+ per hour! You're a good fit if you have (or if you can):
• Excellent communication skills.
• Professional, well spoken, energetic and engaging.
• Timeliness and attention to detail.
• Motivated and able to work without direct supervision. Also want to make sure you have:
• Reliable transportation and cell phone.
• Weekend and Evening availability.
• Able to lift 40 pounds
• Able to stand for extended periods
• Able to setup and/or tear down events, which could include over an hour of physical activity.
• You must be 18 years of age or older* We invite you to See Yourself at Marvin:

From people to products, Marvin is committed to creating better ways of living. When you join this family-owned and -led window and door company, you belong to a community full of opportunities. You also belong to one of America's Top 20 Large Employers of 2024, according to an exclusive ranking by Forbes Magazine.

For more than 100 years, we've been designing, building, and engineering premier products. Today, in our 16 locations across North America, we manufacture Marvin's portfolio of products, which includes Marvin Replacement and more.

A few of our unique offerings include:
• Part time opportunity with schedule flexibility
• Unlimited earning potential - Start at $20 per hour plus performance bonuses. You could average $25-$30 per hour!
• Consistent hours available - 15+ hours per week based on your availability.
• Part-time benefits start on day one! Marvin is an Equal Opportunity Employer:

This job posting is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities of the employee. Accommodation may be made to enable an individual with a disability to perform the essential functions of the position. Any employment offer depends on completing a background check and drug screen to company standards

jobs.title: Promoter
jobs.description:
Company Description

Are you passionate about sports - do you love to talk sports with friends and fans...

Social media startup SPORTalk is currently seeking Sports Content Promoter Interns for your school! SPORTalk is a social media platform that connects you with friends and fans around pro and college sports events you care about most.

Job Description

What you'll be doing :
• Contributing sports content to the SPORTalk team and game walls for your school
• Promoting SPORTalk by building excitement and buzz around your school's football and basketball teams through social media and other marketing avenues
• Managing the SPORTalk Twitter account for your school

Qualifications

Who is a Sports Content Promoter Intern? You are :
• Currently enrolled in the undergraduate program
• Outgoing, passionate, involved, a leader in your school, have a large network of friends and are acquainted with student organizations
• Known for making things happen
• Goal-oriented, enthusiastic, and reliable
• A good communicator
• A sports fan who is knowledgeable about sports and attends college football games

Additional Information

This position will offer you the opportunity to build your resume with real experience and :
• Be part of the team that launches this exciting new sports social media platform
• Gain skills and experience in a variety of areas, including social media marketing, sports marketing, digital marketing, and entrepreneurship
• Enjoy flexibility in terms of hours and location
• Be part of a network of like-minded professionals across North America
• Obtain school credit (as allowed by your school)
• Upon successful completion of your internship you will receive a written recommendation and you may list SPORTalk as a reference for any future job.

Additional Information :

The intern will work under supervision of the SPORTalk Team Manager, and on-the-job training will be provided via teleconference.

We are committed to ensuring that the internship experience is challenging, informative and educational. Interns will gain a good understanding of social and digital media and sports marketing.

This is a non-pay internship

Last updated : 2024-10-04

jobs.title: Promoter
jobs.description:
Kalologie Medspa combines the latest in medical aesthetic treatments, rejuvenating skin care, and results-oriented body treatments to help clients look and feel their best. Kalologie is a premier provider for medical aesthetic treatments such as IV Therapy, Vitamin Shots, Botox, Dermal Fillers, CoolSculpting, and Microneedling.

We are currently looking to add a Promoter to promote awareness at... our locations in Las Vegas at ARIA, Bellagio, Mandalay Bay and Four Seasons.

QUALIFICATIONS:
• Skilled promoter with a strong hospitality and sales background
• Highly self-motivated and dependable
• Outgoing with great communication skills
• Ability to present a professional and neat appearance
• Ability to work weekend morning and afternoon shifts
• Must have positive energy throughout the day
• Must be effective as part of a team; ability to interact with internal and external customers, managers, and co-workers in a professional, courteous manner

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• The primary function of the Promoter is to increase bookings
• The position requires sourcing potential guests from the local population, hotels and casinos, social media, and other relevant channels
• Engaging and providing potential guests with information to visit Kalologie venues
• Educating oneself with selling/promoting techniques and service offerings
• Maintaining high levels of guest engagement
• Developing relationships to create repeat customers
• Creating a reliable and updated network of former and future guests, industry contacts, and reputable leads
• Maintaining a positive, friendly, and professional attitude with co-workers and guests
• Maintaining a professional appearance and adhering to dress code in line with the company policy
• Maintaining a high level of confidentiality regarding guest and company information
• Assisting with and/or completing additional tasks as assigned

Kalologie offers competitive salaries, generous service discounts, and ongoing training opportunities. We promote continued growth and development through our rapidly expanding medical aesthetic clinics

jobs.title: Promoter
jobs.description:
Job Overview

Show and sell. You brighten up every room you’re in and people are drawn to you. Join us as a Product Demonstrator and put your great personality to work. If you’re looking for a job you can do now – with potential to grow later, then ask yourself the questions below...

Are you:
• Friendly?
• Great at talking to crowds?
• A fan of cooking?
• ?17? years or older?
• Able to stand up to 6 hours per day and lift up to 40 pounds?

Then our virtual recruiter is standing by to meet you

jobs.title: Field Promoter / Canvasser
jobs.description:
Joyce Factory Direct is a leading home improvement company specializing in high-quality windows, sunrooms, baths, and other residential renovation products. With a legacy of excellence and a commitment to customer satisfaction, we pride ourselves on helping homeowners transform their living spaces.

Job Description: Are you outgoing, energetic, and love engaging with people? We’re looking for a... Booth Promoter/Demonstrator to join our team and represent Joyce Factory Direct at various events, trade shows, and retail locations. As a Booth Promoter/Demonstrator, you’ll play a key role in generating interest in our home improvement products by engaging with potential customers, demonstrating our products, and collecting leads for our sales team.

Responsibilities:
• Set up and maintain an attractive, professional booth at various events, trade shows, and retail locations.
• Engage with event attendees, explaining the features and benefits of our home improvement products.
• Demonstrate product samples, answer questions, and provide information to potential customers.
• Collect and accurately record customer information and leads for follow-up by the sales team.
• Maintain a friendly and positive demeanor while interacting with customers.
• Assist in the setup and breakdown of booth displays and materials.
• Track and report on leads generated during events.

Requirements:
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Outgoing personality with a passion for engaging with people.
• Ability to stand for extended periods and manage booth setup and breakdown.
• Previous experience in sales, promotions, or customer service is a plus.
• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
• Ability to work weekends and travel to different event locations.
• Reliable transportation is required

jobs.title: Promoter, sales agent for corporate training programs in the NY area
jobs.description:
Ricky Cohen Experience

Promoter/Agent for Corporate Trainer...

Location: New York

Job Type: Commission-Based With Monthly Advance Draw

Reports To: CEO

Ricky Cohen Experience

RCE has energized the corporate training world! Led by Ricky Cohen, with 4 decades of success as a business leader, entrepreneur and educator, RCE creates experiences, rather than lectures or workshops, with the participants uplifted, deeply touched, and transformed as a result of the time spent.

Job Overview

We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Promoter/Agent to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for selling the services of a successful motivational speaker and trainer to corporations. This role involves building relationships with potential clients, understanding their needs, and effectively communicating how our speaker's services can benefit their organization.

Key Responsibilities

Prospecting and Lead Generation:

Identify and research potential corporate clients through various channels, including online platforms, networking events, and industry conferences.

Develop and maintain a robust pipeline of leads to ensure consistent sales activity.

Sales Outreach:

Initiate contact with potential clients via phone, email, and in-person meetings to pitch the motivational speaker's services.

Customize sales presentations and proposals based on the specific needs and objectives of each corporation.

Relationship Building:

Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers within target organizations.

Establish a rapport with clients to understand their culture, challenges, and how our services can provide solutions.

Presentation and Demonstration:

Conduct engaging presentations that showcase the motivational speaker's expertise, past successes, and the value of their training programs.

Arrange for potential clients to attend live events or view recorded sessions to experience the speaker's impact firsthand.

Negotiation and Closing:

Negotiate contracts and pricing with clients, ensuring a win-win agreement that aligns with both parties' expectations.

Close sales and achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets.

Market Analysis:

Stay informed about industry trends, competitor offerings, and market demands to effectively position our services.

Provide feedback to the management team regarding market opportunities and challenges.

Reporting and Administration:

Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and pipeline status using CRM software.

Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts for management review.

Qualifications

Experience:

Experience in selling services in training, coaching, or speaking.

Skills:

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and inspire clients.

Strong negotiation skills and a results-oriented mindset.

Self-Motivation:

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively, with a strong drive to achieve sales targets.

Education:

Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or a related field is preferred but not required.

Compensation

This is a commission-based position with uncapped earning potential. Compensation will be based on sales performance, with additional bonuses for exceeding targets.

25% for sales with a monthly advance against commission.

Full bonuses will be paid for ongoing training programs or follow up engagements.

Why Join Us?

Be part of a passionate team dedicated to making a positive impact on individuals and organizations through motivational speaking and training.

Enjoy the flexibility of working independently while having the support of a collaborative team.

Access to continuous training and development opportunities in sales and personal growth.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should send their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to Rcohen@conwaycap.com. Please include “Promoter/Agent Application” in the subject line.

Join us in inspiring change and empowering organizations to reach their full potential

jobs.title: Intel Promoter
jobs.description:
Job Type:
Regular
...
Work Location:
Best Buy 113 - Santa Clarita, CA 91350

Overview:

2020 Companies is now hiring part-time Intel Promoters!

Pay: Starting at $17 per hour

Schedule: Saturday and Sunday required, 10-hours per weekend

Holiday Schedule: Additional shifts added for holidays or key customer shopping days

Are you passionate about connecting with people? Looking for weekend work? Does the latest technology excite you? If so, this part-time Brand Ambassador role at your nearby retailer would be perfect for you!

In this exciting role, you'll work closely with retail shoppers to recommend the perfect Intel products to meet their unique needs. You'll be the go-to person for customers seeking information on Intel's products, ensuring they have an interactive, informative, and successful shopping experience. All technology training is fully provided by our team.

Our Benefits:
• Competitive hourly rate with weekly pay
• Time Away: Time off is part of the deal because everyone deserves a break
• On-demand pay options through DailyPay
• Paid training is completed online or at home via a computer or mobile device
• Apparel provided
• Exciting work environment to showcase your customer service skills
• Share and learn with ongoing training and development
• A consistent schedule to enable a work/life balance or career
• Scheduled to work during high-traffic times, including weekends (required), occasional weekdays, and holidays

About 2020 Companies

At 2020 Companies, we empower individuals to shape the future of technology. As a trusted partner with Intel and other leading brands, we provide opportunities for our team members to make a real impact by applying their skills and expertise to drive innovation and success.

Job Description:
• Build strong relationships and rapport with Best Buy customers and personnel
• Provide training to store associates on the various Intel products and technologies
• Identify customers' needs and recommend appropriate Intel computer products and services
• Proactively engage customers throughout the sales process, from greeting and discovering their needs to closing the sale
• Track and increase Intel Retail Edge sign-up and engagement
• Ring up your customers' computer purchases on Best Buy's POS system (no cash handling involved)
• Complete same-day online reports to document visits, including providing feedback and observations, and submitting customer and store photos
• Maintain business communication with Best Buy District Manager via occasional phone calls, Zoom meetings, and/or emails
• Rep will handle full sales engagement process with customers, from the initial point of contact through closing and ringing up of purchase
• You will not be responsible for cash handling, only ringing up credit card purchases through the POS register
• Any cash purchases are handed over to a Best Buy employee
• Consistent Weekend Visits: The schedule is primarily Saturday and Sunday shifts.
• Additional work shifts may also be required (e.g., Holiday Selling Days)

Qualifications:
• High school diploma or equivalent required.
• A minimum of 6 months experience in sales, electronics, retail, telecom, or marketing is preferred.
• An interest in PC and Gaming products is a plus.
• Ability to engage, demonstrate, and ask for the sale.
• Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills are essential.
• Impeccable integrity and a genuine commitment to exceeding customer and retail partner expectations.
• Thrive in a fast-paced team environment.
• Availability to work weekends - Saturday and Sunday.
• Own a smartphone.
• Ability to stand, walk around, reach, pick up, bend, grab, up to 20lbs occasionally, with continuous hand/eye coordination and fine manipulation (Accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions).
• Reliable transportation to arrive on time for scheduled visits.

What You Can Expect From 2020 Companies
We welcome every voice, and we are committed to building a truly inclusive environment where your differences are not just welcomed, they are celebrated. We are always identifying opportunities to encourage our team to be their authentic selves, while working to provide a best-in-class experience for our employees. Whether that's paid holidays, long-term career pathing options, personal development opportunities or professional stretch assignments, you can expect 2020 Companies to support you.

2020's Commitment
We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive organization and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other dimensions of identity

jobs.title: Host / Hostess
jobs.description:
Host / Hostess - Pay Range $15.00 to $16.24 per hour

Red Robin isnt your typical burger restaurant. Were a team filled with unbridled energy, magnetic personalities, and a passion for having fun...

Host: You will be responsible for providing a great first impression by displaying a friendly demeanor and escorting Guests to tables. You will also take reservations with a wait list when necessary. This role is a part of the Front of House service team so, great customer service skills are a must. Must be 17 or older.

The role is also eligible to enjoy:
• Flexible work schedules
• 50% discount on Red Robin food and 25% for your family
• Referral bonuses for bringing new members to our team
• Additional compensation and benefits that are listed below
• Excellent opportunities to grow with us!

Red Robin is an equal opportunity employer. We love hearing from great people who share our passion for unbridled hospitality.

Legal Disclosures
• Pay Range (Base Pay): Pay range disclosed above.
• Other Types of Compensation: Referral Bonus, Employee Stock Purchase Program (after 1+ years of service, must have 20+ hours/week).
• Health Insurance: Health, vision, dental, accident, critical illness and hospital indemnity coverage (must be 18+).
• Retirement Benefits: 401(k) retirement plan (with company match to 4% of pay) (must be 21+, after 1+ years of service, and 1,000+ hours/year).
• Paid Time Off: 0.0192 hours for each 1 hour worked (after 1+ years of service, 35+ Hours/week).
• Application Window: Red Robin accepts applications on an ongoing basis.

Red Robin is known for its laid-back atmosphere and uniquely quirky vibe. We love inspiring our guests with burgers beyond yumagination, and were driven by serving up connection, fun and generosity thats as bottomless as our world-famous steak fries! We value a sense of belonging and welcome both similarities and differences, because Red Robin is for everyone.

We are high-volume, full-service restaurant concept that has great growth opportunities. Many of our Managers were hourly Team Members at one time. Our mission is clear: Make it fresh. Make it fun. Make it memorable. And above all, make 'em smile. Become a part of our team today and grow your career with Red Robin Gourmet Burgers and Brews!
#SourcingPro #21uv #21total #redrobin481host #date100124

jobs.title: Host/Hostess
jobs.description:
For this position, pay will be variable by location - See additional job details and benefits below

Work in a team-oriented, high-volume, fast-paced, guest-centric environment to provide guests with a fresh dining experience that celebrates living well by...

Demonstrating genuine hospitality and setting the stage for an exceptional Dining Experience by making every single guest feel welcome at the door and
• Engaging in friendly conversation as you seat guests in a timely fashion
• Introducing guests to their server
• Managing restaurant waiting list during high volume to accurately set guest expectations
• Always sincerely thanking guests as they leave and inviting them to return
• Cleaning and sanitizing Guest touch points in the restaurant
• Team Members receive competitive salary with weekly pay
• Paid Sick Leave (1 hour for every 30 hours worked, begin accruing upon hire up to 40 hours per calendar year)
• Flexible schedules
• Health and Wealth benefits
• Dining and other discounts
• Career Advancement opportunities
